pageProduct.name: Aveeno Daily Moisturising Oat Oil Spray 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Aveeno Daily Moisturising Oil Mist with oat oil plus jojoba oil. 98% naturally derived and formulated without parabens. For conditions dry, rough skin. Smoother, more even skin in 1 week.

Aveeno Daily Moisturising Oil Mist
Light, dry-touch mist, able to dress quickly post application
92% Agree skin looks smoother and more even instantly

Formulated with 
- Oat Oil
Rich in lipids and fatty acids to help condition skin
- Jojoba Oil
Contains up to 2x vitamin E as shea butter

Formulated without Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oil, Silicones Drying Alcohol, Synthetic Dyes.

Hypoallergenic & suitable for sensitive skin.

Also try our Aveeno Daily Moisturising Lotion.

Suitable For: Suitable for sensitive skin.

Size: 200mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

Ingredients

INGREDIENTS: GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) OIL, AVENA SATIVA (OAT) KERNEL OIL, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, FRAGRANCE, LECITHIN, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, TOCOPHEROL

Directions

DIRECTIONS: Spray close to the skin and massage in.
Do not spray near eyes or face.
